MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝In fact, my sisters are currently enrolled in one.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝In fact, my sisters are currently enrolled in one.❞

MESSAGE.JP: それって、やっぱりお嬢様の出なんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: That means she actually is from a wealthy family, doesn't it?
MESSAGE.Translation: That means she actually is from a wealthy family, doesn't it?

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「でも、わたくしはソフトボールを真面目にやりたかったんですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But I wished to play softball seriously here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But I wished to play softball seriously here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「反対は…なかったわけではないですけれど、両親はわかってくれましたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝There were... some people who disagreed. But my parents understood me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝There were... some people who disagreed. But my parents understood me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「苦労して入って、最初は大変でしたけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I ran into other issues not long after my struggle to enroll here...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I ran into other issues not long after my struggle to enroll here...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんかあったの？」
`佐々美@「実力主義ということもあって、レギュラー争いはかなり陰湿なことまで行われてましたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝The club is entirely based on a merit system, and most members resorted to almost anything to become regulars.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝The club is entirely based on a merit system, and most members resorted to almost anything to become regulars.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「一年でレギュラーになったときも、わたくしを妬む輩に色々やられましたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I was made a regular in my first year, and was harassed in every way by the senior members who were jealous of my success.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I was made a regular in my first year, and was harassed in every way by the senior members who were jealous of my success.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん…」
なんか怖い世界だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was quite a scary story.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was quite a scary story.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「特に、上級生の後輩いびりは悪しき伝統でしたのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝The worst of all was the tradition of seniors harassing the juniors.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝The worst of all was the tradition of seniors harassing the juniors.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「でも、今年の三年が引退になって、ようやく改革も終わりそうですわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But once the current third-years graduate, my reform will finally be complete.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But once the current third-years graduate, my reform will finally be complete.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…ちょっとやりすぎた気もしてますけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I think I may have overdone it a little, though.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I think I may have overdone it a little, though.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー…」
笹瀬川さんの慕われっぷりはそういうことか。
MESSAGE.EN: That must be why she is so idolized by the younger members.
MESSAGE.Translation: That must be why she is so idolized by the younger members.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか、カッコいいねそういうの。本当にソフト好きなんだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You are cool. I can tell you really love softball.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You are cool. I can tell you really love softball.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「か、カッコいいって程じゃありませんわ。入学の時だって、ただワガママを押し通しただけですもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I-I am not cool. As for my enrollment here, it was just me being selfish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I-I am not cool. As for my enrollment here, it was just me being selfish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、僕そういうのなかったからなぁ」
`佐々美@「あなたはどうでしたの？」
`理樹@「うん…恭介が入った学校だから、みんな当たり前のようにここ受けてさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well... Since Kyousuke went here, my friends and I decided to take this school's entrance exam without a second thought.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well... Since Kyousuke went here, my friends and I decided to take this school's entrance exam without a second thought.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴はちょっと大変だったんだけどね。真人は…なんか、奇跡みたいに受かったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Rin had a hard time with it, but made it through. As for Masato... it was a miracle he even passed the exam.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Rin had a hard time with it, but made it through. As for Masato... it was a miracle he even passed the exam.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃあ、両親からは何も言われませんでしたの？」
`理樹@「いや、僕は何も言われないよ」
`佐々美@「あら…そうですの？　ずいぶん自由ですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh my... really? Your parents seem quite laissez-faire.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh my... really? Your parents seem quite laissez-faire.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕さ、両親いないから」
`佐々美@「え…」
`理樹@「…小さい頃さ、交通事故で死んじゃったんだ。ふたりとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...They were both killed in a car accident when I was little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...They were both killed in a car accident when I was little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そ、それは…」
`佐々美@「わたくし、とんでもなく失礼なことを…」
`理樹@「いやいや、いいって。気にしてないよ」
`理樹@「みんなもいるし、きっとこれからもやってけると思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have everyone here, so I'm sure I'll be alright from here on out as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have everyone here, so I'm sure I'll be alright from here on out as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ここに来たのもさ、後見人をやってくれてる人にお世話になりっぱなしだったから、っていうのもあるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In fact, I also enrolled here to reduce the burden placed on my guardian, who had always taken care of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In fact, I also enrolled here to reduce the burden placed on my guardian, who had always taken care of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「……っ」
`理樹@「あ、笹瀬川さん？」
`佐々美@「ううぅ…い、いい話ですわね…思わず目頭が」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uuu... W-What a touching story... The tears are just coming out on their own...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uuu... W-What a touching story... The tears are just coming out on their own...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくし、あなたの事を誤解していたようですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I realize I must have misjudged you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I realize I must have misjudged you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやいやいや…そんな大げさなことでもないから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, no, no... It's no big deal...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, no, no... It's no big deal...❞

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、笹瀬川さんも意外に、単純明快ないい人だったんだなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: That is how I found out that she is an unexpectedly kind and honest person...
MESSAGE.Translation: That is how I found out that she is an unexpectedly kind and honest person...

MESSAGE.JP: 他愛ない話をしてるうちに食べ終え、片付けることにする。
`理樹@「じゃ、食器戻してくるね」
`佐々美@「ええ、じゃあちょっとわたくしも…」
`理樹@「え、外出るの？　猫になっちゃうんじゃ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, you sure? You'll turn into a cat again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, you sure? You'll turn into a cat again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…外に出ないと出来ないこともいっぱいありますのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...There are a lot of things you can only do outside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...There are a lot of things you can only do outside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「っていうと…」
`佐々美@「…あんまり言わせないでいただけます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Would you please not question me further?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Would you please not question me further?❞

MESSAGE.JP: あ、トイレとか…。
`理樹@「じゃあ、せっかく鈴が用意してくれたんだし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then why don't you use the litter box Rin set up for you...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then why don't you use the litter box Rin set up for you...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「何かお言いになって？」
`理樹@「うん、ちょっと猫になって、そこで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, after you turn into a cat outside, come back here and...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, after you turn into a cat outside, come back here and...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「おころしあそばせますわよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Would you like me to kill you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Would you like me to kill you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: …笑顔が怖い…。
MESSAGE.EN: That smile of hers was horrifying...
MESSAGE.Translation: That smile of hers was horrifying...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃ、そういうわけですの」
部屋から一歩外に出ると。
MESSAGE.EN: As soon as she took a step outside...
MESSAGE.Translation: As soon as she took a step outside...

MESSAGE.JP: ぼん。
`佐々美@「…ううぅ、何度やってもこれは慣れませんわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...Uuu, no matter how many times I do this, I just cannot get used to it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...Uuu, no matter how many times I do this, I just cannot get used to it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「気をつけてね」
`佐々美@「ええ…」
後ろ姿を見送って、僕は学食へ向かった。
MESSAGE.EN: After seeing her off, I headed for the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: After seeing her off, I headed for the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 改めて考えると、本当に妙なことになったよなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Thinking back on it, things really turned out to be strange...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thinking back on it, things really turned out to be strange...

MESSAGE.JP: 食器を片付けると。
MESSAGE.EN: After I put my tray away...
MESSAGE.Translation: After I put my tray away...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうだ…」
ジュースでも買って帰ることにしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided I should buy a drink.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided I should buy a drink.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えーと…」
明日のお昼までに飲むものも用意しておいた方が良さそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I should probably get Sasasegawa-san something to drink with tomorrow's lunch, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should probably get Sasasegawa-san something to drink with tomorrow's lunch, too.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さん、何飲むのかな。
MESSAGE.EN: What does she usually drink, I wonder?
MESSAGE.Translation: What does she usually drink, I wonder?

MESSAGE.JP: 紅茶が好きそうだったし、一本はそれでいいだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I know she likes black tea, at least.
MESSAGE.Translation: I know she likes black tea, at least.

MESSAGE.JP: もう一本はどうしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: What else should I get her...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What else should I get her...?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（スポーツやってるならポカリかなぁ）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(Maybe she'd like Pocari Sweat since she plays sports.)
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(Maybe she'd like Pocari Sweat since she plays sports.)

MESSAGE.JP: 個人的には一番笹瀬川さん向けだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: That seemed to fit her the best.
MESSAGE.Translation: That seemed to fit her the best.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日は僕の分も、スポーツドリンクにすることにしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to pick a sports drink for myself as well.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to pick a sports drink for myself as well.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ただいま…って、ありゃ」
笹瀬川さんはまだ戻ってないみたいだ。部屋のドアを少し開けておこう。
MESSAGE.EN: She wasn't back yet; I left the door open for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: She wasn't back yet; I left the door open for her.

MESSAGE.JP: 窓になんか張ってある。
MESSAGE.EN: There was something on the window sill.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was something on the window sill.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだろ…」
小毬さんからだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a letter from Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a letter from Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 『さーちゃんのおようふくを持ってきました。なかよくしてあげてね。　こまりより』
MESSAGE.EN: [I brought some of Sa-chan's clothes. Get along with her, okay? -Komari]
MESSAGE.Translation: [I brought some of Sa-chan's clothes. Get along with her, okay? -Komari]

MESSAGE.JP: 見れば、その下には、ぱんぱんに膨れたバッグが置いてあった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a bulging bag below the window.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a bulging bag below the window.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さん、気が利くなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: I was once again impressed by how thoughtful she was.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was once again impressed by how thoughtful she was.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら？　なんですの？」
`理樹@「あ…遅かったね」
見れば、猫姿の笹瀬川さんがドアから入ってきたところだった。
MESSAGE.EN: As I turned around, the feline Sasasegawa-san was entering the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: As I turned around, the feline Sasasegawa-san was entering the room.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「予告状？」
`理樹@「いや、怪盗もキャッツも来てないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, there's been no phantom thief here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, there's been no phantom thief here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さんが着替えを持ってきてくれたんだ」
`佐々美@「あら…後で連絡をいれようと思ってましたのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Oh dear... I was going to text her about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Oh dear... I was going to text her about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「まあ、手間が省けて助かりましたわ」
`理樹@「じゃ、これどうしよう」
`佐々美@「邪魔じゃないところに置いておいてくれればいいですわよ」
ぼん。
`佐々美@「あ、戻りましたわ…」
`理樹@「じゃ、どうする？　これ着替えも入ってると思うけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you want to change right away?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you want to change right away?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「後でいいですわ。どうせいつもこの格好で過ごしてますし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It can wait. I usually dress like this anyway.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It can wait. I usually dress like this anyway.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そう？　じゃ、机の横に置いておくよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh yeah? I'll put the bag by my desk then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh yeah? I'll put the bag by my desk then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いえ、中身だけ先に確認しますわ。貸していただけます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wait a moment. I wish to check what is inside. Could you pass it to me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wait a moment. I wish to check what is inside. Could you pass it to me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
`理樹@「じゃ、ジュース買ってきたから好きに飲んでいいよ。冷蔵庫入れとくからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I got some drinks for us. You can take whatever you want from the fridge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I got some drinks for us. You can take whatever you want from the fridge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら、気が利きますわね」
`理樹@「うん、ついでだったから」
自分の分のスポーツドリンクを飲むことにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I started drinking my sports drink.
MESSAGE.Translation: I started drinking my sports drink.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら…」
`佐々美@「制服の替えしか入ってませんわね…」
`佐々美@「あとは、なぜか袋のお菓子とペロペロキャンディが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And a bag of snacks and lollipops for some incomprehensible reason...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And a bag of snacks and lollipops for some incomprehensible reason...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、小毬さんらしいと言えばらしいんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: That was so very like Komari-san...
MESSAGE.Translation: That was so very like Komari-san...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、じゃあどうするの？」
`佐々美@「…仕方ありませんわね。何か服を貸していただけないかしら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I have no other choice. May I borrow some of your clothes...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I have no other choice. May I borrow some of your clothes...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃもちろんかまわないよ。Ｔシャツとかならあるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Of course. I've got T-shirts and stuff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Of course. I've got T-shirts and stuff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: Ｔシャツなら多少だぼだぼでも問題はないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought T-shirts would work even if they were somewhat oversized for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought T-shirts would work even if they were somewhat oversized for her.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃ、お借りしますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Very well, I will help myself to them...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Very well, I will help myself to them...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんかこれ、本当に同棲みたいだねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You know what, we look almost like a couple living together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You know what, we look almost like a couple living together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「なっ…!!」
`佐々美@「ど、どうせいっ!?」
`理樹@「あ、いや、深い意味はないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uh, no, I didn't mean anything serious by it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uh, no, I didn't mean anything serious by it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あ、あなたとっ…」
`佐々美@「やっぱりこれ、遠慮しますわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I have changed my mind. I will not wear any of your clothes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I have changed my mind. I will not wear any of your clothes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、いいの？」
`佐々美@「もうこのまま制服でかまいませんわ」
`理樹@「でも…」
`佐々美@「かまいませんのよっ!!」
…色々理不尽だなぁ…。
`理樹@「笹瀬川さん、ワガママだねぇ…」
`佐々美@「何か言いまして？」
`理樹@「いや…」
まあ、わかってたことだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, I did know that from the start.
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, I did know that from the start.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ふむ」
でもまあ、なんか笹瀬川さんのことは嫌いじゃない。
MESSAGE.EN: But it's not that I dislike her.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it's not that I dislike her.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴といがみあってる時にはわからなかったけど、なんか結構いい人だし。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't tell it when she and Rin were at each other's throats, but I've come to realize she is actually a very kind girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't tell it when she and Rin were at each other's throats, but I've come to realize she is actually a very kind girl.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「？　どうしましたの？」
`理樹@「うん？　別に」
`佐々美@「ヘンな人ですわね」
`理樹@「え…ヘン？」
`佐々美@「相当ヘンな人ですわよ。あなたほどお人よしな人はそうはいませんわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Indeed you are. Few people would help others out like you do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Indeed you are. Few people would help others out like you do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　そうかなぁ」
`佐々美@「ええ。申し訳ないですけれど、今後ともよろしく頼みますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I do. I regret having to impose on you, but I trust myself in your care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I do. I regret having to impose on you, but I trust myself in your care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「こちらこそ」
頭を下げあう。
`理樹@「…嫁入りの挨拶？」
…無言でこっちに来る。
`理樹@「あっ、いや、率直な感想だから、深い意味はないからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, no, It just popped into my mind! I didn't mean anything by it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, no, It just popped into my mind! I didn't mean anything by it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …怖い。
`佐々美@「お世話になっておいていうのもなんですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I know I should not say this when you have been taking such good care of me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I know I should not say this when you have been taking such good care of me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: むんず、とほっぺをつままれる。
`佐々美@「あなたとこうしているのは、し・か・た・な・くですわっ!!　そこを勘違いしないで下さるっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝The reason I am living here with you is just because I HAVE NO OTHER OPTION!! Please make no mistake on that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝The reason I am living here with you is just because I HAVE NO OTHER OPTION!! Please make no mistake on that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほへへっ…ほくらっふぇははってふふょっ」
僕だってわかってるよ、と言った。
MESSAGE.EN: I tried to say I knew that.
MESSAGE.Translation: I tried to say I knew that.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ならいいですわ」
ふん、と一瞥すると、戻っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She shot a sideways glance at me, hmphed at me, and returned to her spot.
MESSAGE.Translation: She shot a sideways glance at me, hmphed at me, and returned to her spot.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（でもやっぱり、基本はこういう人なんだなぁ…）
まあ、しょうがないかぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: Not that there was anything I could do about it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not that there was anything I could do about it.

MESSAGE.JP: 荷物の整理がすむと、笹瀬川さんはストレッチ運動を始めていた。
MESSAGE.EN: After sorting out her stuff, she started a stretching.
MESSAGE.Translation: After sorting out her stuff, she started a stretching.

MESSAGE.JP: 足を伸ばして体を前に倒す、おなじみのやつだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The moves were classical, and she was performing them with deceptive ease.
MESSAGE.Translation: The moves were classical, and she was performing them with deceptive ease.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうのって、毎日やってるの？」
`佐々美@「ええ…昨日はサボってしまいましたけど…」
`佐々美@「一応、最低限は動いておかないと、すぐ衰えてしまいますから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I need to at least do this. Otherwise my body will lose its edge...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I need to at least do this. Otherwise my body will lose its edge...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ちょうどいいですわ。腹筋しますから、足を押さえてくださいます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Actually, it is good you are here. Do you mind holding my legs while I do sit-ups?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Actually, it is good you are here. Do you mind holding my legs while I do sit-ups?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、いいよ」
なんか僕は同じ部屋になった人の、筋トレに付き合う運命にあるらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like I was forever fated to help my roommate do sit-ups.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like I was forever fated to help my roommate do sit-ups.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いちっ、にっ…」
びっ、びっ、とリズミカルに腹筋を続ける笹瀬川さん。
MESSAGE.EN: She was rhythmically lifting her upper body.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was rhythmically lifting her upper body.

MESSAGE.JP: なんかこう。
`佐々美@「？　どうしましたの？」
`理樹@「い、いや…」
なんか、変にドキドキする…。
`佐々美@「にじゅくっ、さんじゅっ…」
`佐々美@「ふうっ…」
三十回で終わりみたいだ。
真人の腹筋に付き合ってると、それが短く思えてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Compared to Masato, that number felt strikingly low.
MESSAGE.Translation: Compared to Masato, that number felt strikingly low.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「インターバル入れて、もう１セットお願いしますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I will do another set after a short interval.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I will do another set after a short interval.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
`理樹@「どうでもいいけど、笹瀬川さん」
`佐々美@「なんですの？」
`理樹@「さっきから気になってたんだけど、やっぱりスカートで腹筋やってると、ぱんつが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I couldn't help noticing that your underwear's almost visible when you do sit-ups.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I couldn't help noticing that your underwear's almost visible when you do sit-ups.❞

MESSAGE.JP: がんっ!!
…腹筋の勢いで頭突きされた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She head-butted me with the full momentum of a sit-up.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She head-butted me with the full momentum of a sit-up.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなたが見なければいいだけですわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It is only a problem if you look at them!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It is only a problem if you look at them!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: だって見えちゃいそうなんだもん…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I just couldn't help it...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I just couldn't help it...

MESSAGE.JP: 筋トレを終えると、笹瀬川さんが部屋を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: She left the room after finishing her exercises.
MESSAGE.Translation: She left the room after finishing her exercises.

MESSAGE.JP: 三十分ほど。
`理樹@「どうしたんだろ…」
トイレにしては長すぎるし…。
MESSAGE.EN: If it was the bathroom, she should be back already...
MESSAGE.Translation: If it was the bathroom, she should be back already...

MESSAGE.JP: なんかあったんじゃ。
MESSAGE.EN: Something might have happened to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Something might have happened to her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「見に行こう」
立ち上がると。
MESSAGE.EN: As I got to my feet,
MESSAGE.Translation: As I got to my feet,

MESSAGE.JP: かりかり…。
`理樹@「あ」
ドアをこする音。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard scratching at the door.
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard scratching at the door.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おかえり。何かあったの？」
`佐々美@「いえ、少し…」
`理樹@「え、どうしたのさ」
`佐々美@「ちょっとシャワーを、ですわ」
`理樹@「あー」
猫のまま浴びても意味があるものなんだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if showering as a cat even made any sense.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if showering as a cat even made any sense.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃ、元に戻ったら着替えますから、そしたらちょっと出てって下さらない？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I will change when I return to human, so would you wait in the hallway, please?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I will change when I return to human, so would you wait in the hallway, please?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかった」
そうこうしてるうちに、夜も更けてくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Like that, the evening went on.
MESSAGE.Translation: Like that, the evening went on.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そろそろ寝ますわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I think I shall take to bed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I think I shall take to bed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、そうしようか」
ベッドに入る。
MESSAGE.EN: We both got into our bunks.
MESSAGE.Translation: We both got into our bunks.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それじゃ、おやすみ」
`佐々美@「ええ…」
`佐々美@「やっぱり、慣れませんわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I still cannot get used to this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I still cannot get used to this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いえ、しょうがないんですけど…」
`理樹@「いやまあ…」
慣れないのはこっちも一緒だ。
MESSAGE.EN: I hardly had gotten used to this, either.
MESSAGE.Translation: I hardly had gotten used to this, either.

MESSAGE.JP: …昨日は猫だったしそんなに意識してなかったけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Since she was a cat the previous night, it never really crossed my mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Since she was a cat the previous night, it never really crossed my mind.

MESSAGE.JP: すぐ近くで女の子が寝てるってのは、こう…。
MESSAGE.EN: But that night, she was human, and that made me somewhat...
MESSAGE.Translation: But that night, she was human, and that made me somewhat...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（落ち着かないよなぁ…）
`佐々美@「よりによって、黒猫だなんて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Why a black cat, of all cats...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Why a black cat, of all cats...❞

MESSAGE.JP: …そっちか。
`佐々美@「なんですの？」
`理樹@「い、いや、なんでよりによってなの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝W-Well, what do you mean by ❛of all cats❜?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝W-Well, what do you mean by ❛of all cats❜?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ごまかす。
`佐々美@「黒猫は…特に嫌いなんですのよ」
`佐々美@「…気にしてしまいますから」
`佐々美@「電気、消してくださいます？」
`理樹@「あっ、う、うん」
`佐々美@「…ふう」
`佐々美@「今日も終わってしまいましたわね…」
`理樹@「あ、うん…」
`佐々美@「でも今日はこの格好で寝れるだけマシですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But today's better since I can at least sleep as myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But today's better since I can at least sleep as myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ねえ」
`佐々美@「なにかしら？」
`理樹@「猫になるって、どんな感じなの？」
`佐々美@「なんとも形容しがたいですわ…」
`佐々美@「とりあえず、あまりいい気持ちじゃあないですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝At the very least, it is not very comfortable...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝At the very least, it is not very comfortable...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、やっぱりそうなんだ…」
`佐々美@「自分の体が自分じゃなくなるんですもの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It feels like your own body is no longer your own.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It feels like your own body is no longer your own.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それに、長く猫でいると…本当に自分が猫になってしまったような感覚に襲われますの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝And on top of that, the longer I stay a cat... the more it feels like I really am becoming a cat..❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝And on top of that, the longer I stay a cat... the more it feels like I really am becoming a cat..❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「元に戻れたり、話が出来たりしてますから大丈夫ですけど、それもなかったら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Since I have someone to talk to and can return to being a human here, I have been able to cope with it, but had I not...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Since I have someone to talk to and can return to being a human here, I have been able to cope with it, but had I not...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「考えたくもないですわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I do not wish to even think about it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I do not wish to even think about it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そりゃね…」
`佐々美@「だから、あなたがいて助かってますのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So having you around really is a lifesaver.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So having you around really is a lifesaver.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか、何にも力になれてない気がするけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't think I'm being all that helpful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't think I'm being all that helpful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いるだけでマシですわ」
`理樹@「あ、そう…」
相変わらず言動はキツい。
`佐々美@「あなたが宮沢様だったらもっと良かったのに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝It would be even better if you were Miyazawa-sama...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝It would be even better if you were Miyazawa-sama...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いえ、やっぱりダメですわ…」
`理樹@「あはは…」
猫の姿を見られるのはいやなんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She must not want him to see her as a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: She must not want him to see her as a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういえば、笹瀬川さん、いつも謙吾に付きまと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Speaking of Kengo, aren't you always following him ar...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Speaking of Kengo, aren't you always following him ar...❞

MESSAGE.JP: いや、付き纏うって言い方はまずかったっ。
MESSAGE.EN: No, ❛following around❜ definitely wasn't a good choice of words!
MESSAGE.Translation: No, ❛following around❜ definitely wasn't a good choice of words!

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「つきまと？」
怒りのオーラが下から昇って来るのがわかる…。
MESSAGE.EN: I could sense the flames of rage licking me...
MESSAGE.Translation: I could sense the flames of rage licking me...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめんなさい、言い方がまずかったです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I apologize. I should've phrased it better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I apologize. I should've phrased it better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 言い直そう。
`理樹@「謙吾にストーキングしてる」
`佐々美@「尚悪いですわぁっ!!」
`理樹@「うわっ、だ、だって他に言葉が思いつかなかったんだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwa, b-but, I couldn't think of any other way to put it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwa, b-but, I couldn't think of any other way to put it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「もうちょっとボキャブラリをましにしてきてくださいますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Would you work a little harder on your vocabulary!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Would you work a little harder on your vocabulary!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ど、努力します」
`理樹@「…で、なんで笹瀬川さん、謙吾にそういう風になったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So, what made you fall for him?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So, what made you fall for him?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「な、なんでって…」
`佐々美@「それは、ですわね…」
`理樹@「うん」
`佐々美@「昔、宮沢様は見ず知らずのわたくしを、身を挺して助けてくれたんですの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Long ago, he helped me out of his own volition, even though I was a total stranger to him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Long ago, he helped me out of his own volition, even though I was a total stranger to him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そのあまりの男らしさに、わたくしはそれ以来、ずっと憧れ続けて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝He looked so manly back then, and I have admired him ever since...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝He looked so manly back then, and I have admired him ever since...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へー、謙吾らしいね。助けてって、何をしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's just like him. What exactly did he help you with?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's just like him. What exactly did he help you with?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わ、わたくしのなくしてしまった大切なものを、危険を顧みず取ってきてくださったのですわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝H-He went through great personal peril to return something important I had lost...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝H-He went through great personal peril to return something important I had lost...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「って、わたくしのこんな話を聞いてどうするんですの!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝H-Hold on, why am I telling you this!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝H-Hold on, why am I telling you this!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや、なんとなく気になって…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Well, I just wanted to know...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Well, I just wanted to know...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あんまり恥ずかしい話させないでくださいますっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Please do not make me embarrass myself any more than I have to!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Please do not make me embarrass myself any more than I have to!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ごめん…」
話題を変えよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to change the subject.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to change the subject.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、何で猫なんだろうね」
`理樹@「笹瀬川さん、何か心当たり…」
`佐々美@「もー、さっさと寝るんじゃありませんのっ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Geez, are we not supposed to sleep now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Geez, are we not supposed to sleep now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…」
真面目な話なんだけどなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted to have a serious discussion.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted to have a serious discussion.

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、明日でもいいか…。
どれだけの時間が過ぎただろう。
MESSAGE.EN: How much time had passed by?
MESSAGE.Translation: How much time had passed by?

MESSAGE.JP: 居場所を探してさまよう毎日。
MESSAGE.EN: All that time, 'they' had been looking for a place to belong.
MESSAGE.Translation: All that time, 'they' had been looking for a place to belong.

MESSAGE.JP: いくつもの命が生まれるのを見た。
MESSAGE.EN: ❜They❜ had seen many lives come into the world.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❜They❜ had seen many lives come into the world.

MESSAGE.JP: いくつもの命が失われるのを見た。
ここにいるのが、奇跡だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a miracle ❛they❜ were even here.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a miracle ❛they❜ were even here.

MESSAGE.JP: そして、まだ。
『誰か』は、まだなにも伝えられずにいる。
MESSAGE.EN: That ❜someone❜ had not yet told anyone anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: That ❜someone❜ had not yet told anyone anything.

MESSAGE.JP: …ねえ。
本当にさ。
うまくいかないんだ、世界っていうのは。
MESSAGE.EN: It really never turns the way you wish.
MESSAGE.Translation: It really never turns the way you wish.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、それだけ…。
それだけ、なのに…。
MESSAGE.EN: That's all there is to it, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: That's all there is to it, but...

MESSAGE.JP: ゆさゆさ。
身体が揺すられている。
…真人？
`佐々美@「時間ですわよっ。さっさと起きなさいっ」
笹瀬川さんだった。
`理樹@「ああ…おはよう…」
`理樹@「ふあぁあ…」
`佐々美@「ずいぶんゆっくりのお目覚めですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You sure take your time waking up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You sure take your time waking up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、もうそんな時間？」
時計を見る。
…いつもより少し早いくらいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was a little earlier than I usually woke up.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was a little earlier than I usually woke up.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「全然大丈夫だけど…」
`佐々美@「あ、あら…そうですの？」
ま、いいか…。
梯子に立っている笹瀬川さんにどいてもらって、下りる事にする。
MESSAGE.EN: After she got down off the ladder, I climbed down, too.
MESSAGE.Translation: After she got down off the ladder, I climbed down, too.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「今日はどうするの？」
`佐々美@「どうもこうも…少なくとも学校にはいけませんわね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝More of the same... I still cannot go to school...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝More of the same... I still cannot go to school...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだねぇ。また昼休みに合流しようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Right. Let's meet up during lunch again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Right. Let's meet up during lunch again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それまでは、各自で行動しよう」
`佐々美@「わかりましたわ…」
`理樹@「うん、じゃ、僕は学校行くよ」
とりあえず、着替えよう。
`佐々美@「きゃっ…」
`佐々美@「ちょ、ちょっと!!　レディの前ですわよ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝E-Excuse me!! How dare you do that in front of a lady!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝E-Excuse me!! How dare you do that in front of a lady!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あなたにはデリカシーが欠け過ぎてますわっ!!」
`理樹@「あ、ご、ごめん…」
なんか僕、謝ってばっかりだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I seem to keep apologizing to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I seem to keep apologizing to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 用意も出来たので、学食へ向かうことにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to leave for the cafeteria after finishing my morning preparations.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to leave for the cafeteria after finishing my morning preparations.

MESSAGE.JP: 笹瀬川さんは当然、留守番だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san was, of course, going to stay in my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san was, of course, going to stay in my room.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、後よろしくね」
`佐々美@「ちょっと、頭跳ねてますわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wait a minute. You have bed hair.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wait a minute. You have bed hair.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 触ってみると、寝癖が。
`理樹@「あー、まあいいよこれくらい」
`佐々美@「良くありませんわよ。ほら、貸して御覧なさい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝You should mind. Come here and lower your head.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝You should mind. Come here and lower your head.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 櫛で寝癖をすく。
顔、近い…。
MESSAGE.EN: Her face was so close to mine...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her face was so close to mine...

MESSAGE.JP: デリカシーって意味じゃ、笹瀬川さんも相当無い気がするけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Talk about delicacy. She didn't have a shred of it either...
MESSAGE.Translation: Talk about delicacy. She didn't have a shred of it either...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「戻りませんわね」
`理樹@「あ、だから、もういいって」
`佐々美@「ダメですわ。キッチリしてないのは、見てるとイライラしますのっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝No, it is not. Seeing poorly groomed people irritates me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝No, it is not. Seeing poorly groomed people irritates me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: …今度はヘアスプレーを用意してきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Changing strategy, she took out a bottle of hair spray.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Changing strategy, she took out a bottle of hair spray.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「これでバッチリですわ」
ぷしゅ。ぷしゅっ。
`理樹@「うわっ…」
いきなり掛けられる。
MESSAGE.EN: She sprayed my head without warning.
MESSAGE.Translation: She sprayed my head without warning.

MESSAGE.JP: 櫛ですくと。
MESSAGE.EN: Then she combed my hair again.
MESSAGE.Translation: Then she combed my hair again.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ほんとだ。直った」
`佐々美@「ちょっとぺったりしますけど、乾いたら手ぐしで直せますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Your hair is a little flat right now, but once it dries, you can fix it by hand.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Your hair is a little flat right now, but once it dries, you can fix it by hand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃ、いってらっしゃいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Well then, have a good day at school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Well then, have a good day at school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、ありがとう」
…変な所で世話焼きだなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She was annoyed by the most unexpected things.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She was annoyed by the most unexpected things.

MESSAGE.JP: 朝食の席。
`理樹@「おはよう」
`鈴@「うん、おはよう」
`理樹@「今日は早いね」
`鈴@「おまえらが遅いんだ」
…なるほど。ちょっとごたごたしたせいで、いつもよりは遅い時間になってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I see. I seemed to have arrived later than usual due to that event with my hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I see. I seemed to have arrived later than usual due to that event with my hair.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おはよう。遅くなってしまったな」
`理樹@「今日は自主トレ？」
`謙吾@「ああ」
`謙吾@「ところで真人はどうしたんだ？」
`理樹@「え？　真人がどうかしたの？」
昨日から謙吾のところに泊まってるはずだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: He should have been staying in Kengo's room as of last night.
MESSAGE.Translation: He should have been staying in Kengo's room as of last night.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「別にどーもしてないだろ」
`理樹@「うん」
`謙吾@「ふむ…？　ま、いいか」
謙吾はそういうと、おにぎりをはむ、と頬張る。
MESSAGE.EN: After saying that, he bit into his rice ball.
MESSAGE.Translation: After saying that, he bit into his rice ball.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、どうした」
`謙吾@「これは…」
`謙吾@「なんと、おにぎりに小梅がふたつも入っている!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Look, there are two pickled plums in this rice ball!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Look, there are two pickled plums in this rice ball!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにい…」
`理樹@「へえー、めずらしいねぇ」
`謙吾@「ふ、中にふたつも入っているとは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Heh, I got two plums in one rice ball...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Heh, I got two plums in one rice ball...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「これは今日一日素晴らしい幸運が起こりそうな予感だなっ!!　ひゃっほうっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I feel that today is going to be the best day ever!! Yahoo!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I feel that today is going to be the best day ever!! Yahoo!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小梅ふたつでそれだけの予感を感じるんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm impressed that just two tiny pickled plums can make you feel like that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm impressed that just two tiny pickled plums can make you feel like that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今の謙吾なら、箸が転がっても幸運の予感になる気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I'm sure the current Kengo would definitely feel the same even from finding a 10-yen coin on the ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'm sure the current Kengo would definitely feel the same even from finding a 10-yen coin on the ground.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹…おまえの小梅を、あたしにくれ」
`理樹@「え…いや、後から付け足したって予感にはならないと思うけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh... well, I don't think it has much meaning if you're getting help from others...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh... well, I don't think it has much meaning if you're getting help from others...❞

MESSAGE.JP: うらやましいらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: She appeared to be jealous of him.
MESSAGE.Translation: She appeared to be jealous of him.

MESSAGE.JP: 教室に入る。
`葉留佳@「お、来ましたヨ。おっはよー」
`クド@「ぐっどもーにんぐですー」
`鈴@「みんな、おはよう」
`理樹@「おはよう」
席に着く。
`理樹@「あれ、どうしたの？」
`鈴@「こまりちゃんがいないな」
`理樹@「あれ、そういえば」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it, she's not.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Now that you mention it, she's not.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「うーん…」
`鈴@「寝坊でもしたんじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I wonder if she slept in or something...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I wonder if she slept in or something...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 心配そうだ。
`理樹@「まあ、まだ始業までは時間があるし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, there's still some time until the first lesson.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, there's still some time until the first lesson.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「それもそうだな」
一時間目が終わる。
今日は、休み時間を全て探索に費やすことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided to spend every break I had today exploring.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided to spend every break I had today exploring.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下に出て、怪しいところを探し回ってみることにする。
MESSAGE.EN: I went into the hallway and started looking for anything suspicious.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went into the hallway and started looking for anything suspicious.

MESSAGE.JP: …何にも当てはないけど、もしかしたら今いる『ここ』のホコロビが、見つかるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Although I had no definite ideas, I thought I might be able to find a frayed part of ❛this world.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Although I had no definite ideas, I thought I might be able to find a frayed part of ❛this world.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 本当は、小毬さんも一緒に探して欲しかったんだけど、今日は休みらしい…。
MESSAGE.EN: It would have been helpful to have had Komari-san with me, but she ended up being absent.
MESSAGE.Translation: It would have been helpful to have had Komari-san with me, but she ended up being absent.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。胸騒ぎがする。
MESSAGE.EN: What was this uneasy feeling I had?
MESSAGE.Translation: What was this uneasy feeling I had?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なにもないかぁ」
結局、一時間目の休み時間は、収穫なし。
二時間目。
屋上に出てみたけど、おかしなところもない。
MESSAGE.EN: I went up to the rooftop, but nothing up there was out of place.
MESSAGE.Translation: I went up to the rooftop, but nothing up there was out of place.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ歩き回っただけで終わってしまった…。
MESSAGE.EN: I just ended up walking around...
MESSAGE.Translation: I just ended up walking around...

MESSAGE.JP: 三時間目。
…外に出てみたけど、まったく同じ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I went outside, but nothing there had changed.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I went outside, but nothing there had changed.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…？」
そういえば、校舎裏に行ってない。
MESSAGE.EN: I realized I hadn't checked out behind the school building yet.
MESSAGE.Translation: I realized I hadn't checked out behind the school building yet.

MESSAGE.JP: あそこは、あの黒猫が寝てたところだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was where that black cat had made its home.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was where that black cat had made its home.

MESSAGE.JP: …行ってみよう。
`理樹@「あれ…」
こんなに遠かったっけ。
MESSAGE.EN: It shouldn't have been that far.
MESSAGE.Translation: It shouldn't have been that far.

MESSAGE.JP: ここ、裏庭…？
`理樹@「何でこんなとこに出るんだ…!?」
`理樹@「…い、行けない…!?」
なんで…!?
もう一度やってみよう…。
結果は同じだった。
MESSAGE.EN: But the result was the same.
MESSAGE.Translation: But the result was the same.

MESSAGE.JP: 何かに押し戻されるような、方向を捻じ曲げられるような…。
MESSAGE.EN: It was like there was some force pushing me back or twisting the direction I was heading.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was like there was some force pushing me back or twisting the direction I was heading.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ど、どうなってるんだ…？」
これは、間違いなく『ここ』のホコロビのひとつだと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: It must have been a frayed part of ❛this world.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: It must have been a frayed part of ❛this world.❜

MESSAGE.JP: けど…。
どうして、あそこだけなんだろう…？
MESSAGE.EN: But why just behind the school building...?
MESSAGE.Translation: But why just behind the school building...?

MESSAGE.JP: 近づけたくない何かがあるから…？
MESSAGE.EN: Was there something there that had to be hidden?
MESSAGE.Translation: Was there something there that had to be hidden?

MESSAGE.JP: 少なくとも、それは間違いない気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought that must be the reason.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought that must be the reason.

MESSAGE.JP: …ここを作った『誰か』は、あそこに行って欲しくないんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The ❛someone❜ who created this world didn't want anyone in there.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The ❛someone❜ who created this world didn't want anyone in there.

MESSAGE.JP: でも、何のためにこんな、あからさまな方法をとったんだろう？
MESSAGE.EN: But why did they choose something so obvious?
MESSAGE.Translation: But why did they choose something so obvious?

MESSAGE.JP: 近づけないようにするんだったら、もっとスマートな方法があるはずだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There should be a more cunning way to keep people out.
MESSAGE.Translation: There should be a more cunning way to keep people out.

MESSAGE.JP: こんな、異常な現象を使うなんて、そこが怪しいって言ってるようなもんじゃないか。
MESSAGE.EN: Creating such a bizarre obstacle did nothing more than point out that there's something there.
MESSAGE.Translation: Creating such a bizarre obstacle did nothing more than point out that there's something there.

MESSAGE.JP: 何か、引っかかる。
ここは『あの時』の世界と同じ物だって、なんとなく考えてたけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'd been thinking that like this was more or less the same as ❛that world❜...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd been thinking that like this was more or less the same as ❛that world❜...

MESSAGE.JP: 何か、決定的に違う気がする…。
MESSAGE.EN: However, it felt like there was a definite difference...
MESSAGE.Translation: However, it felt like there was a definite difference...

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know exactly how they were different.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know exactly how they were different.

MESSAGE.JP: それが、きっと核心に繋がる物のような気がするんだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, I had the feeling that the difference lay at the heart of this entire matter...
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, I had the feeling that the difference lay at the heart of this entire matter...

MESSAGE.JP: 昼休みになった。
`理樹@「さて…」
部屋に戻ろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I needed to get back to my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: I needed to get back to my room.

MESSAGE.JP: ご飯を持っていかないといけないし、さっきのことも相談したい。
MESSAGE.EN: Not only to bring her lunch, but also to consult with her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Not only to bring her lunch, but also to consult with her.

MESSAGE.JP: 購買でサンドイッチを買う。
MESSAGE.EN: I bought sandwiches at the school store.
MESSAGE.Translation: I bought sandwiches at the school store.

MESSAGE.JP: 飲み物は昨日のがあるから、多分必要はないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't buy any drinks this time, since there were still some in the fridge from yesterday.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't buy any drinks this time, since there were still some in the fridge from yesterday.

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、いいにおいが…。
`佐々美@「ふんふんふーん♪」
じゅーじゅー、と小気味のいい音をバックに、笹瀬川さんが鼻歌を歌っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was humming to the sound of the frying pan she was stirring.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was humming to the sound of the frying pan she was stirring.

MESSAGE.JP: 何をしてるんだろう…。
そしてあのエプロンは一体なんだろう…。
MESSAGE.EN: And that apron, just what on earth...?
MESSAGE.Translation: And that apron, just what on earth...?

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「あら、お帰りなさいませ」
`理樹@「あ、うん…」
返答に困る…。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know what to say.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know what to say.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…楽しそうだね」
`佐々美@「あら。そう？」
`理樹@「…うん」
`佐々美@「すぐにふたり分用意しますから、ちょっとまってていただけます？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I have almost finished cooking our lunch, so could you wait a minute please?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I have almost finished cooking our lunch, so could you wait a minute please?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…」
テーブルにはお茶碗と飯盒。
MESSAGE.EN: There were bowls set on the table, together with the pot from the rice cooker.
MESSAGE.Translation: There were bowls set on the table, together with the pot from the rice cooker.

MESSAGE.JP: 火はカセットコンロを使っているようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She was using our portable gas stove.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was using our portable gas stove.

MESSAGE.JP: 改めて、エプロンを見る…。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at her apron once more...
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at her apron once more...

MESSAGE.JP: 一体何を思って笹瀬川さんはあのエプロンをつけているのだろう…？
MESSAGE.EN: What in the world had made her wear that...?
MESSAGE.Translation: What in the world had made her wear that...?

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「らららー♪」
歌いながら中華なべに調味料と思われる液体を入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She poured some liquid flavoring into the wok, singing merrily to herself.
MESSAGE.Translation: She poured some liquid flavoring into the wok, singing merrily to herself.

MESSAGE.JP: 瞬間、ぼっと炎が立った。
MESSAGE.EN: In the next breath, a flame puffed up from the pan.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the next breath, a flame puffed up from the pan.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「おーっほっほっほっほ!!」
うわあ、ものすごく楽しそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She appeared to be having a super fun time.
MESSAGE.Translation: She appeared to be having a super fun time.

MESSAGE.JP: 何でそんなハイテンションなんだ、と突っ込みたかったけど、エプロンにも突っ込みたかったし、そもそも何やってるんですかと突っ込むのもアリだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a nearly undeniable urge to ask her what she was so excited with, why she was wearing the apron, and, to top it all off, what the heck she was doing.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a nearly undeniable urge to ask her what she was so excited with, why she was wearing the apron, and, to top it all off, what the heck she was doing.

MESSAGE.JP: 要するに、今の笹瀬川さんはツッコミどころ満載だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Simply put, I had a ton of questions for her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Simply put, I had a ton of questions for her.

MESSAGE.JP: …本人は中華なべを翻し。
MESSAGE.EN: ...While I took stock of the scene, she kept stir-frying the wok.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...While I took stock of the scene, she kept stir-frying the wok.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ほーっほっほっほっほ!!」
いや、なんか楽しそうだからいいけどさ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I guess I should just let her do her thing since she seemed to be having such a great time of it...
MESSAGE.Translation: I guess I should just let her do her thing since she seemed to be having such a great time of it...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「というわけで、出来ましてよ」
目の前に用意されたのは、ご飯とチンジャオロースー、それにレタスとトマトのサラダ、香の物だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Shortly thereafter, there were cooked rice, green pepper steak, tomato and lettuce salad, and pickled vegetables served on the table.
MESSAGE.Translation: Shortly thereafter, there were cooked rice, green pepper steak, tomato and lettuce salad, and pickled vegetables served on the table.

MESSAGE.JP: ちなみに開いた窓程度でしか換気が出来てないので、部屋は料理の匂いでいっぱいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: By the way, since the only ventilation in the room was the open window, the smell of cooking still lingered strongly in the air.
MESSAGE.Translation: By the way, since the only ventilation in the room was the open window, the smell of cooking still lingered strongly in the air.

MESSAGE.JP: …まあ、いいけど。
`理樹@「あ、うん…いただきます」
`佐々美@「いただきますわ」
ぱくぱく。
`理樹@「おっ…」
`佐々美@「どうかしら？」
`理樹@「おっ、美味しいっ」
普段、ピーマンはあんまり美味しいとは思わないんだけど、このチンジャオロースーはピカイチだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't normally like the taste of pepper much, but the pepper steak she'd made tasted heavenly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't normally like the taste of pepper much, but the pepper steak she'd made tasted heavenly.

MESSAGE.JP: お肉と細切りのピーマンの絶妙なバランス。
MESSAGE.EN: The exquisite combination of meat and thinly sliced pepper.
MESSAGE.Translation: The exquisite combination of meat and thinly sliced pepper.

MESSAGE.JP: 決して歯ごたえを失わず、かといってあくまでも食べやすく。
MESSAGE.EN: Despite the firm texture, it was easy to chew.
MESSAGE.Translation: Despite the firm texture, it was easy to chew.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これはまさに完全なるチンジャオロースーだよ!!」
`佐々美@「おーっほっほっほ!!　もっと誉めるといいですわっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ohohhohhoh!! You may praise my work to your heart's content!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ohohhohhoh!! You may praise my work to your heart's content!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「さあ、まだいっぱいありますから、たくさん食べてくださいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I cooked a lot, so help yourself to ample seconds.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I cooked a lot, so help yourself to ample seconds.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うんっ」
ぱくぱく。
`理樹@「おっ、こっちもいい味だねっ」
`佐々美@「あ、あら、そうかしら」
ぱくぱく。
`佐々美@「って何をわたくしはこんなに和んでるんですのーっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Wait, why am I being so docile!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Wait, why am I being so docile!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわあっ、ツッコミ我慢してたら、自らツッコミを入れちゃったっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Uwah, I was trying to avoid the question, but here you go and ask it yourself!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Uwah, I was trying to avoid the question, but here you go and ask it yourself!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「我慢しないでさっさと突っ込んでくださいますっ!?」
`理樹@「あ、いや…だって笹瀬川さんが楽しそうだったから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you know... you seemed to be having so much fun...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you know... you seemed to be having so much fun...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「楽しいですわよ、それは」
`佐々美@「ただ、食べて『あ、美味しい』と思った瞬間…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝But when I ate the dish and thought ❛Oh, how delicious❜ to myself...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝But when I ate the dish and thought ❛Oh, how delicious❜ to myself...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「なぜか急激に情けなくなってきましたわ…」
`佐々美@「ううぅ…なぜわたくしがこんなことに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Uuu... How did it end up like this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Uuu... How did it end up like this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、でもさ、こういう状況でも楽しむのは大切だよ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, it's important to keep yourself entertained, even at times like this!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, it's important to keep yourself entertained, even at times like this!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ピリピリしてばっかじゃ、息詰まって上手くいくものもいかなくなるしさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If you're too strung up, you'll stumble and fail at even things you'd otherwise succeed at.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If you're too strung up, you'll stumble and fail at even things you'd otherwise succeed at.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それに、なんか新婚さんみたいな雰囲気で和むのも当然…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Besides, it's easy to feel relaxed when we're living sort of like a newlywed couple...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Besides, it's easy to feel relaxed when we're living sort of like a newlywed couple...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「だ・れ・が・新婚さんですのっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝WHO ARE YOU CALLING A NEWLYWED COUPLE!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝WHO ARE YOU CALLING A NEWLYWED COUPLE!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: むんず、とほっペをつままれる。
`理樹@「ふはっ、ほ、ほへんっ」
だってなんかそれっぽかったんだもん…。
MESSAGE.EN: But I had just given my honest impression...
MESSAGE.Translation: But I had just given my honest impression...

MESSAGE.JP: でも、ご飯は美味しい。
MESSAGE.EN: Either way, the food was delicious.
MESSAGE.Translation: Either way, the food was delicious.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これ、材料はどうしたの？」
`佐々美@「ちょっと、学食から拝借してまいりましたわ」
`理樹@「あー…」
猫の姿じゃ、大変だっただろうなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: It must have been hard work for a cat.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must have been hard work for a cat.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まさに、キャッツ」
`佐々美@「は？」
`理樹@「なんでもないです」
`理樹@「…えーと」
`佐々美@「今度はなんですの？」
いや…。
はたしてこのエプロンは突っ込んでいいものだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't decide if it was safe to ask about her apron or not.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't decide if it was safe to ask about her apron or not.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。ものすごく対応に困る。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no idea how to react to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no idea how to react to it.

MESSAGE.JP: 『ファンシーだね』と誉めた方がいいんだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Should I compliment it by saying something like ❛That sure is fancy❜?
MESSAGE.Translation: Should I compliment it by saying something like ❛That sure is fancy❜?

MESSAGE.JP: いや…。
もしかして、見間違えで、実はごく普通のエプロンだったりしないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe my eyes were simply playing tricks on me, and the apron was in reality completely ordinary.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe my eyes were simply playing tricks on me, and the apron was in reality completely ordinary.

MESSAGE.JP: 眼をこすってみる。
ダメだ、変わらない。
MESSAGE.EN: Shoot, it was still the same.
MESSAGE.Translation: Shoot, it was still the same.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「さっきからなんですの…」
`理樹@「あ、いや…」
勇気を出して突っ込んでみよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I gathered the nerve to ask.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gathered the nerve to ask.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そのエプロンなんだけど…」
`佐々美@「ああ、ちょっとそこにあったのを借りましたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Ah, I found it here, so I borrowed it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Ah, I found it here, so I borrowed it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: そこにあった…!?
`鈴@「ねこの行進、にゃんにゃん」
一瞬、鈴の声が脳裏を過ぎる。
MESSAGE.EN: I could hear Rin's voice in my head for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could hear Rin's voice in my head for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（鈴が持ってきていたのだろうか？）
`理樹@「でも、そのエプロン…」
`佐々美@「さっきからなんですの」
やっぱり誉めてみよう。
`理樹@「エレガントだね」
`佐々美@「いいえ、プリちーですわ」
`理樹@「あ、そう…」
認識はしているらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: It seems she did realize what she was wearing.
MESSAGE.Translation: It seems she did realize what she was wearing.

MESSAGE.JP: デザインについて、これ以上は突っ込まないけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I decided not to ask any further about the design.
MESSAGE.Translation: I decided not to ask any further about the design.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、笹瀬川さん、猫嫌いなんじゃなかったっけ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, Sasasegawa-san, you hate cats, don't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, Sasasegawa-san, you hate cats, don't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「嫌いですわよ」
`理樹@「でも…」
`佐々美@「…エプロンは逃げませんもの」
サラダを口に運ぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: She carried a pinch of salad to her mouth.
MESSAGE.Translation: She carried a pinch of salad to her mouth.

MESSAGE.JP: 何か、引っかかるんだ。
…多分、僕はそれを訊かなきゃいけないんだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...It was probably something I knew I needed to ask her.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...It was probably something I knew I needed to ask her.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（ま、いいか…）
なんか、楽しそうな笹瀬川さんは、とても可愛い。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason she looked just adorable, having fun like this.
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason she looked just adorable, having fun like this.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな顔ができるんだって思ったら、もっと見てたいなって。
MESSAGE.EN: If she could make a face like that, I wouldn't mind seeing it more.
MESSAGE.Translation: If she could make a face like that, I wouldn't mind seeing it more.

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、変な感じだけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly noticed something seemed off...
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly noticed something seemed off...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「どうしましたの？」
`理樹@「い、いや…」
…僕は、なんか変な感じで、ドキドキしていた。
`佐々美@「なんだか挙動不審ですわね…」
`理樹@「そ、そんなことないよっ。うん、美味しいよこれっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-It's your imagination. Wow, this is tasty!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-It's your imagination. Wow, this is tasty!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「まあ、当然ですわね」
ばん。
`鈴@「理樹っ」
突然ドアが開いて、鈴の声が。
MESSAGE.EN: The door flew open without warning, and Rin strode in.
MESSAGE.Translation: The door flew open without warning, and Rin strode in.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼんっ。
`佐々美@「ふぎゃぁーーーっ!!」
`理樹@「うわっ、大丈夫!?」
急に猫になったせいで、顔に熱々のチンジャオロースーを落としたらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Since she was just about to bite into her pepper steak, it fell on her face as she transformed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since she was just about to bite into her pepper steak, it fell on her face as she transformed.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「のんきに飯食ってる場合かっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is no time to be enjoying your lunch!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is no time to be enjoying your lunch!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええぇ…そんなに慌ててどうしたの…」
`鈴@「こまりちゃんがいない!!」
`鈴@「寮に行ってもいないんだ!!」
`理樹@「待って、どういうこと？」
`鈴@「いいからこいっ!!」
むんず、と手を掴まれる。
`理樹@「え、あ、ちょっと…」
結局、鈴に引きずられて外まで来てしまう。
`理樹@（笹瀬川さんを置いてきてしまった…）
`鈴@「早くっ!!　遅いぞっ」
`理樹@「あ、うん…」
しょうがないな…。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave up and decided to do what she wanted.
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave up and decided to do what she wanted.

MESSAGE.JP: けど、小毬さんがいないって…？
MESSAGE.EN: But what did she mean by Komari-san having disappeared...?
MESSAGE.Translation: But what did she mean by Komari-san having disappeared...?

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の言ったとおり、女子寮の小毬さんの部屋は空っぽになっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like Rin had said earlier, there was no one in Komari-san's dorm room.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like Rin had said earlier, there was no one in Komari-san's dorm room.

MESSAGE.JP: …今日休んだなら、寮で寝てるはずなのに。
MESSAGE.EN: ...If she really were taking a day off from school, she should have been resting here.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...If she really were taking a day off from school, she should have been resting here.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「心配になって様子を見にきたんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I was worried, so I came to see how she was doing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I was worried, so I came to see how she was doing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そしたら、もういなかったんだ」
`理樹@「携帯は？」
`鈴@「通じない」
…どういうことだろう？
`理樹@「鈴」
`鈴@「なんだ」
`理樹@「言いそびれてたけど、今の状況を話すよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I haven't had an opportunity until now, but I should tell you what's going on.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I haven't had an opportunity until now, but I should tell you what's going on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴をこの事件に巻き込むのは、笹瀬川さんは嫌がるだろうけど…そんなこと言ってる場合じゃないだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Sasasegawa-san would object to getting Rin involved in this, but I had no other choice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Sasasegawa-san would object to getting Rin involved in this, but I had no other choice.

MESSAGE.JP: とりあえず笹瀬川さんのことには触れないで、鈴にあらかたの話を伝えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I told Rin everything I knew without mentioning Sasasegawa-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: I told Rin everything I knew without mentioning Sasasegawa-san.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにい…」
`理樹@「そういうわけなんだ…」
`理樹@「今は誰がこの世界に『いる』のかはわからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We don't know who ❛exists❜ in this world at the moment.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We don't know who ❛exists❜ in this world at the moment.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ…？　今度は何が起こってるんだ…？」
`理樹@「まだわからない…」
`理樹@「ただ、ここを作った誰かがいるってことだけは、確かだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But the one thing I do know for sure is that someone created this world.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But the one thing I do know for sure is that someone created this world.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そしてそれは、僕らじゃない」
`鈴@「じゃあ、あたしらは誰かが作ったここに巻き込まれてるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So we've been caught in this place that someone made?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So we've been caught in this place that someone made?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだと思う…」
ふと、思いつく。
`理樹@「これは僕の考えだけどさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I've got a couple of questions for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I've got a couple of questions for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「この世界を動かす…うーん、権限って言うのかな。そういうの、鈴にはある？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you think you have... hmm, how should I put it... authority over this world, Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you think you have... hmm, how should I put it... authority over this world, Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どういうことだ」
`理樹@「前の、恭介や謙吾みたいに」
`鈴@「んなこと言われてもよーわからん」
`理樹@「じゃあ、さっき見つけたんだけど、校舎裏の焼却炉の方に、行けない道があるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, I discovered that we can't get to the path that leads behind the school building right now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, I discovered that we can't get to the path that leads behind the school building right now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴はその道を『開ける』ことはできる？」
`鈴@「…そんなの、できない」
`鈴@「どーやってやったかも知らないのに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝How can I do it when I don't even know how it got closed?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝How can I do it when I don't even know how it got closed?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、当然、僕にもできない」
`理樹@「誰かが作ったルールだったら、作った誰か…『マスター』には、ルールを変えることができるはずだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If it's a rule that somebody set, then that somebody... the ❛master❜ or ❜masters,❜ should be able to change it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If it's a rule that somebody set, then that somebody... the ❛master❜ or ❜masters,❜ should be able to change it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そういうことだよ。僕らは『マスター』じゃないんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But we can't do it, and therefore neither of us are the ❛master.❜❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But we can't do it, and therefore neither of us are the ❛master.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…前と同じ状況だったら、『マスター』じゃない人は、何もないはずだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...If we're truly in the same situation as before, those who are not one of the world's ❛masters❜ wouldn't be able to do anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...If we're truly in the same situation as before, those who are not one of the world's ❛masters❜ wouldn't be able to do anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「当然、小毬さんも違った」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Naturally, Komari-san isn't one of them, either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Naturally, Komari-san isn't one of them, either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いなくなったら、もうここは維持できないはずだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Because the world wouldn't be able to maintain itself if it loses any of them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Because the world wouldn't be able to maintain itself if it loses any of them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ってことは、ここから退場させられただけなんじゃないかって思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So I think she was simply ejected from here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So I think she was simply ejected from here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふーむ、なんかすごいな」
`理樹@「え、なにが？」
`鈴@「理樹がめいたんてーのよーだ」
`理樹@「そりゃ、どうも」
今はすらすらと頭が回る。
MESSAGE.EN: My head was in top form at the moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: My head was in top form at the moment.

MESSAGE.JP: …これまで、ちゃんと整理しながら考えた結果だと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That was probably because I'd been able to properly organize what I knew so far.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That was probably because I'd been able to properly organize what I knew so far.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「しかし、こまりちゃんは脱出できたとして…あたしたちはどうすればいいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But if we assume Komari-chan made it out... what are we supposed to do about that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But if we assume Komari-chan made it out... what are we supposed to do about that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わからないけど…」
`理樹@「それは作った人の心次第だと思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess it depends on the creator.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess it depends on the creator.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「悪意を持って作った世界だったら、僕らには何かがあるかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If they were being malicious when they created it, then something might happen to us.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If they were being malicious when they created it, then something might happen to us.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだそれは…」
`理樹@「たとえば…」
…考えて、背筋がひやりとする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...When I thought about it, a chill went down my spine.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...When I thought about it, a chill went down my spine.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ここから、出られない、とか」
しまった。ただ鈴を不安にさせただけだったかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: Shoot, I might've just put her on edge...
MESSAGE.Translation: Shoot, I might've just put her on edge...

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…でも、だいじょうぶだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I'm sure everything's going to be fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I'm sure everything's going to be fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「悪いやつだったら、理樹がやっつければいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝If they're evil, you can just beat them up, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝If they're evil, you can just beat them up, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、なんかおかしいか？」
`理樹@「いや」
`理樹@「うん、そりゃそうだね」
…そりゃ、そうだ。
僕らは、リトルバスターズだった。
リトルバスターズは悪いやつらを成敗する、正義の味方だ。
MESSAGE.EN: And the Little Busters is a team which preserves justice and punishes evil.
MESSAGE.Translation: And the Little Busters is a team which preserves justice and punishes evil.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「でも、あたしはなんとなく、悪いやつじゃない気もする」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝But I also feel like they're not bad guys.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝But I also feel like they're not bad guys.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なんで」
`鈴@「なんとなく」
`理樹@「うーん」
…この世界も、誰かの『想い』が作ったのだとしたら。
MESSAGE.EN: ...If this world had also been made with someone's ❜wish,❜
MESSAGE.Translation: ...If this world had also been made with someone's ❜wish,❜

MESSAGE.JP: そんなに強いものを抱いている人が、悪戯や悪意で作るなんて、考えにくい。
MESSAGE.EN: it was hard for me to believe that such a strong wish would be made as a joke or out of spite.
MESSAGE.Translation: it was hard for me to believe that such a strong wish would be made as a joke or out of spite.

MESSAGE.JP: いや、僕がそう思いたいっていうだけなんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: Or rather, it was just that I personally wanted it to be that way.
MESSAGE.Translation: Or rather, it was just that I personally wanted it to be that way.

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そういえば…」
`理樹@「え、なんか気づいたことでもあった？」
`鈴@「真人はどうした」
`理樹@「え」
`理樹@「そういえば…」
`鈴@「朝から、いなかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I haven't seen him since last night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I haven't seen him since last night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人も…!?」
なんで、気付かなかったんだ。
`鈴@「そーいえば、くるがやもいない」
`理樹@「…教室、西園さん、いたっけ…」
`鈴@「いなかったよーな…」
`理樹@「ああぁ…」
一瞬、頭が眩む。
MESSAGE.EN: I felt dizzy for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: I felt dizzy for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: なんでそんなことに、気付かなかったんだ…!!
`鈴@「…前にも、こんなことがあった気がするぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...I feel like I've experienced this before...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...I feel like I've experienced this before...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「気付いてから気付くんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You notice it when you notice it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You notice it when you notice it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、どういうこと…」
`鈴@「…なんか、当たり前になってるんだ」
`鈴@「変なことでも、それで当たり前になってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝No matter how weird it is, you take it for granted.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝No matter how weird it is, you take it for granted.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 今日の朝の、真人みたいに。
MESSAGE.EN: Just like how I didn't notice that Masato wasn't there this morning,
MESSAGE.Translation: Just like how I didn't notice that Masato wasn't there this morning,

MESSAGE.JP: …おかしいって事に、気付く事が出来ない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Even if there's something unusual, you just don't pay attention to it.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Even if there's something unusual, you just don't pay attention to it.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだろう。
そういう感覚は、前にも味わったことがある。
あれは…。
いつだっけ…。
もやがかかったように思い出せない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't remember, as if my memory of it was shrouded in a thick fog.
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't remember, as if my memory of it was shrouded in a thick fog.

MESSAGE.JP: 思い出せないけど、『ここ』みたいな世界の出来事だったと思う。
MESSAGE.EN: Yet I was sure that it was something I experienced in a world just like this one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Yet I was sure that it was something I experienced in a world just like this one.

MESSAGE.JP: それはひょっとして、世界自体がそうさせてるんじゃないだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps it was a property of the world itself?
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps it was a property of the world itself?

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんか、厄介なことになってるぞ…」
`鈴@「まー、だいじょうぶだろ」
`理樹@「気楽だねぇ、鈴」
`鈴@「うん」
`理樹@「そりゃ、なんでまた」
`鈴@「おまえがめーたんてーだからだ」
鈴と別れて、男子寮に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: After splitting up with Rin, I headed back to the boys' dorm.
MESSAGE.Translation: After splitting up with Rin, I headed back to the boys' dorm.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（めーたんてー、かぁ…）
そりゃ、どう考えたって恭介や来ヶ谷さんの役だ。
MESSAGE.EN: That was obviously a role someone like Kyousuke or Kurugaya-san should play.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was obviously a role someone like Kyousuke or Kurugaya-san should play.

MESSAGE.JP: …出来るのかどうか、なんて考えるけど。
MESSAGE.EN: I wondered if I could do it myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wondered if I could do it myself.

MESSAGE.JP: 考える前に、やらなきゃしょうがない。
MESSAGE.EN: But there was no use questioning my role; I must simply fulfill it.
MESSAGE.Translation: But there was no use questioning my role; I must simply fulfill it.

MESSAGE.JP: 考えはまとまってきたし、核心へは着実に近づけてると思う。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I was doing well in putting my idea together and steadily drawing closer to the core of the incident.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I was doing well in putting my idea together and steadily drawing closer to the core of the incident.

MESSAGE.JP: 自分でも思うけど、結構自信持っていいんじゃないだろうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I was allowed to feel confident in myself.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was allowed to feel confident in myself.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
やる気出そう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should motivate myself even more.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should motivate myself even more.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ようしっ」
…これ、本当にポジティブになるなぁ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This word really was making me positive.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This word really was making me positive.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ただい…」
思わず言葉に詰まる。
鼻の頭がちょっと赤い。
MESSAGE.EN: The top of her nose was slightly red.
MESSAGE.Translation: The top of her nose was slightly red.

MESSAGE.JP: さっきので火傷したんだろうか…。
MESSAGE.EN: It must have been burned earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: It must have been burned earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「お、怒ってらっしゃいますか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I-I was wondering if you were angry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I-I was wondering if you were angry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「いいえ？　ちっとも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I am not. Not in the least.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I am not. Not in the least.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 嘘だ。
`佐々美@「…やっぱり、どうなっても棗鈴との相性は最悪ですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...In the end, whatever happens, Rin Natsume and I are fated to cross each other.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...In the end, whatever happens, Rin Natsume and I are fated to cross each other.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、いや…」
…その鈴から結構色々と情報を集めることが出来たんだけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Actually, she had just given me a lot of information.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Actually, she had just given me a lot of information.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「それで、なんでしたの？」
`理樹@「うん…」
`理樹@「それがさ、小毬さんがいなくなっちゃったみたいなんだ…」
`佐々美@「は…？」
`理樹@「さっきのこと、話すよ」
`佐々美@「…ホラーですわね…」
`理樹@「うん…でも、そんなに恐ろしいものじゃない、と、思う…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah... Although I don't think it's quite as scary...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah... Although I don't think it's quite as scary...❞

MESSAGE.JP: 確信できてはいないので、微妙に言葉を濁してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Since I wasn't completely certain yet myself, I left my words vague.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since I wasn't completely certain yet myself, I left my words vague.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「わたくしは、あなたほど楽観的には考えられませんわ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I cannot feel as optimistic as you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I cannot feel as optimistic as you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「…もしかしたら、強い恨みだって原因になるかもしれないんじゃなくて？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...This world could have been created out of animosity, could it not?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...This world could have been created out of animosity, could it not?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うーん…」
確かに。
`理樹@「でも、誰が恨みなんて持ってるのさ…」
`佐々美@「…それはそっくり言葉を返しますわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝...I shall return the question right back to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝...I shall return the question right back to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の論だって、誰かがわからない。
MESSAGE.EN: Even in my theory, it was still unclear who the culprit was.
MESSAGE.Translation: Even in my theory, it was still unclear who the culprit was.

MESSAGE.JP: …世界を作るほどの、なんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: A wish strong enough to create this world...
MESSAGE.Translation: A wish strong enough to create this world...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー…ちょっと自信付いたのになぁ」
僕と違う視点から切り返されると、甘いところが色々と見えてくる…。
MESSAGE.EN: Thanks to her opinion, I was starting to lose the conviction I'd had in my theory...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thanks to her opinion, I was starting to lose the conviction I'd had in my theory...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「結論を急いでもしょうがない、って言ったのはあなたでしょう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Was it not you yourself who said we should not jump to conclusions?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Was it not you yourself who said we should not jump to conclusions?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そーだね…僕、言った…」
名探偵への道はまだまだ遠い…。
MESSAGE.EN: The road to becoming a great detective was long and thorny.
MESSAGE.Translation: The road to becoming a great detective was long and thorny.

MESSAGE.JP: ぼんっ。
`理樹@「あ」
不意に鈴が部屋に飛び込んできて、また笹瀬川さんが猫化した…。
MESSAGE.EN: Out of the blue, Rin stormed into the room, and Sasasegawa-san turned into a cat once again...
MESSAGE.Translation: Out of the blue, Rin stormed into the room, and Sasasegawa-san turned into a cat once again...

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ま、またですのっ!!」
`鈴@「ん、どうした」
`理樹@「あー、いや…」
`佐々美@「な・つ・め・り・ん…ここであったが百年目ですわっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume! I will finish you right here, right now!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Rin Natsume! I will finish you right here, right now!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「わあっ、待った待ったっ」
がっし、と猫の笹瀬川さんの胴を捕まえる。
MESSAGE.EN: I wrapped my arms around her body to stop her.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wrapped my arms around her body to stop her.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ふしゃーっ!!」
`鈴@「うわっ…またこいつかっ」
`理樹@「う、うんっ、で、なにさっ!!」
`鈴@「実はだな…」
`佐々美@「ちょっとっ、
離しなさいっ!!」
`理樹@「鈴、
ちょっと手短にっ」
`鈴@「なんだ、真面目に話に来てるんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What? I'm here to have a serious conversation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What? I'm here to have a serious conversation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「まあ、いい。こまりちゃんのこれを持ってきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, anyway, I brought you something of Komari-chan's.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, anyway, I brought you something of Komari-chan's.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なにこれ…？」
`鈴@「絵本だ」
`鈴@「…あたしにこれを見せてくれて、あたしはいろいろ気付いたんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...When she showed it to me, I realized a lot of things.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...When she showed it to me, I realized a lot of things.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹の役に立つかもしれない」
`理樹@「小毬さんのか…」
`鈴@「じゃ、あたしは行くぞ」
`理樹@「うん、ありが…
うわっ」
`佐々美@「待ちなさいっ!!
こらぁーっ!!
`鈴@「うわっ…ここまで嫌われるとは…」
`鈴@「自信なくすな…ぶつぶつ…」
鈴は出て行った。
`理樹@「ふう…」
`佐々美@「ちょっと、はなしてくださいますっ!?」
`理樹@「ダメだよっ。鈴のこと追いかけてってケンカしないって言うなら…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No! Unless you promise me you won't go after her and fight...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No! Unless you promise me you won't go after her and fight...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「そんな約束
できませんわっ」
`理樹@「いたたっ、爪っ、爪立ってるっ!!」
`理樹@「こんなときにケンカしてややこしくしたらまずいでしょっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You shouldn't pick a fight at a time like this, or things will get even more complicated!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You shouldn't pick a fight at a time like this, or things will get even more complicated!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「関係ないですわっ!!
ライバルに勝負を挑むのは当然
でしてよっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: challenging one's rival to a fight!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: challenging one's rival to a fight!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは私怨だよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's just you wanting to take out your anger on her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's just you wanting to take out your anger on her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「もーっ、いいから離してくださいますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝For god's sake, would you let me go already!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝For god's sake, would you let me go already!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぼん。
`理樹@
「むぎゅっ…」
`佐々美@「あ、あら…？」
…元に戻った。
なんというか。
これは僕が膝の上に笹瀬川さんを抱えているという、非常にまずいシチュエーションなのではないでしょうか。
MESSAGE.EN: I think the situation I was in, with me down on my knees embracing her, was honestly very bad.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think the situation I was in, with me down on my knees embracing her, was honestly very bad.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「ああ、あの、あのっ…」
`理樹@「ご、ごめんっ」
ば、と離れる。
MESSAGE.EN: I got off of her immediately.
MESSAGE.Translation: I got off of her immediately.

MESSAGE.JP: これは、また雷が落ちるかもしれない…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was worried that she might pounce on me yet again...
MESSAGE.Translation: I was worried that she might pounce on me yet again...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あの、笹瀬川さん…」
`理樹@「笹瀬川さん？」
`佐々美@「な、なんですのっ!?」
`理樹@「ごめん…」
`佐々美@「はっ!?　い、いえ、その…」
`佐々美@「こ、今度から気をつけてくださいますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝P-Please be careful not to let this happen again, all right!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝P-Please be careful not to let this happen again, all right!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: ぷい、とそっぽを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned her face away from me.
MESSAGE.Translation: She turned her face away from me.

MESSAGE.JP: 良かった、その程度ですんで…。
MESSAGE.EN: Thank god, she wasn't as mad as I expected...
MESSAGE.Translation: Thank god, she wasn't as mad as I expected...

MESSAGE.JP: …と、昼休み終了５分前の鐘が鳴る。
MESSAGE.EN: ...We heard the bell signaling the imminent end of lunch break.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...We heard the bell signaling the imminent end of lunch break.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、戻らなきゃ…」
`理樹@「ごめん、また放課後ね」
`佐々美@「え、ええ…」
`理樹@「ふう…」
廊下に出ると、ひとつ息を吐く。
MESSAGE.EN: I let out a deep breath when I got out into the hallway.
MESSAGE.Translation: I let out a deep breath when I got out into the hallway.

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、毎回毎回いろんな事が起こりすぎだなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: So many things have been happening that I've had little time to rest these days...
MESSAGE.Translation: So many things have been happening that I've had little time to rest these days...

MESSAGE.JP: 放課後。
`佐々美@「遅かったですわね」
`理樹@「ごめん、出来るだけすぐ戻ってきたんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry, I got back here as quickly as I could...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry, I got back here as quickly as I could...❞

MESSAGE.JP: さっきの後だから、ちょっと気まずい。
MESSAGE.EN: We were both feeling awkward because of what happened earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: We were both feeling awkward because of what happened earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「まあ、いいですわ…」
`理樹@「あ、うん」
`理樹@「…で、これが鈴の言ってた、小毬さんの絵本か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...So that's Komari-san's picture book that Rin brought here?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...So that's Komari-san's picture book that Rin brought here?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「見てみましたけど、わたくしには何もわかりませんでしたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝I was looking at it, but I did not figure anything out.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝I was looking at it, but I did not figure anything out.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん…」
中を見てみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a look at the first page.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a look at the first page.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ…」
前に見たことがあるやつだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I had read this once before.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had read this once before.

MESSAGE.JP: ただ、前と違って、今はちゃんと完成している。
MESSAGE.EN: The difference was that the story was now complete.
MESSAGE.Translation: The difference was that the story was now complete.

MESSAGE.JP: おんなのこはその小人たちと仲良くなる。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl becomes good friends with the dwarves.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl becomes good friends with the dwarves.

MESSAGE.JP: おとこのこは、その小人たちの悩みを、がんばってひとつずつなくしていく。
MESSAGE.EN: The boy works hard and helps free each dwarf of their worries.
MESSAGE.Translation: The boy works hard and helps free each dwarf of their worries.

MESSAGE.JP: 悩みのなくなった小人たちは、ひとりずつ、森を去っていく。
MESSAGE.EN: Once their problems are gone, they leave the forest one by one.
MESSAGE.Translation: Once their problems are gone, they leave the forest one by one.

MESSAGE.JP: これは、縮図だ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was a miniature representation of what happened back in that world.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was a miniature representation of what happened back in that world.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんが何を思って描いたかはわからないけど、あの時の世界での出来事を、モデルにしてることは間違いない。
MESSAGE.EN: I didn't know what she was thinking when she wrote it, but I was pretty certain it was based off our experiences in that world.
MESSAGE.Translation: I didn't know what she was thinking when she wrote it, but I was pretty certain it was based off our experiences in that world.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「悩みのなくなった小人が森を去っていく、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The dwarves leave the forest when their problems are gone.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The dwarves leave the forest when their problems are gone.❞

MESSAGE.JP: 逆を言えば、悩みがなくなれば森から出られる、ということ。
MESSAGE.EN: To switch it around, when they leave, they no longer have anything to worry about.
MESSAGE.Translation: To switch it around, when they leave, they no longer have anything to worry about.

MESSAGE.JP: 森は、思いで成り立つ世界。願いの叶う世界。
MESSAGE.EN: The forest is a world built upon thoughts, and the world is one where one's wishes come true.
MESSAGE.Translation: The forest is a world built upon thoughts, and the world is one where one's wishes come true.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これは、すごいヒントだ」
`佐々美@「え？」
`理樹@「脱出方法、わかったかもしれない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I might've figured out how to get out of here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I might've figured out how to get out of here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「本当ですの!?」
`理樹@「でも、それだけじゃどうしようもないんだけどね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's no point in just knowing that, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's no point in just knowing that, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「何でもいいですわ、聞かせてくださいますっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝Never mind that. Would you tell me!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝Never mind that. Would you tell me!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
`理樹@「この世界は、誰かの思いや願いが作ったものだとすると、さ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝If this world has been created by someone's thoughts or wish...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝If this world has been created by someone's thoughts or wish...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それを叶えればいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We only need to make it come true.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We only need to make it come true.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは、多分僕らにできることなんだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That must be something that we can do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That must be something that we can do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「僕らに望むから、僕らはここで特別な権利を与えられてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝We're getting special treatment because they want us to do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝We're getting special treatment because they want us to do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、僕自身にはさっぱり見当も付かないんだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I have no clue what they might be wishing for, though...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I have no clue what they might be wishing for, though...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「結局、その作った本人を見つけないと話にならないですわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Sasami@❝So when all is said and done, we cannot grant their wish unless we find and ask them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Sasami@❝So when all is said and done, we cannot grant their wish unless we find and ask them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん…」
`理樹@「でもさ、指針は出来たんじゃないかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Still I think we at least have a guideline now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Still I think we at least have a guideline now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そのヒントはどこかにあるはずだから。例えば、今日行けなかった場所」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There must be hints about it laying around here. Take that unreachable place, for instance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There must be hints about it laying around here. Take that unreachable place, for instance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あそこにも、きっと何かがあると思う」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sure we'll find something if we make it there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sure we'll find something if we make it there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `佐々美@「じゃ、行きましょう」
`理樹@「え？　どこに…？」
笹瀬川さんが外に出る。
ぼん。
`佐々美@「決まってるでしょう？　探索ですわ」
猫になって、颯爽と部屋を出て行く。
MESSAGE.EN: She transformed into a cat and started down the hall gallantly.
MESSAGE.Translation: She transformed into a cat and started down the hall gallantly.

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん」
…こういうときの笹瀬川さんの行動力は、なんか頼もしい。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I found her ability to jump into action at times like that reassuring.
